entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
